episodes.title: 96 Cults, Trafficking, and Writing [Amanda Catarzi]
episodes.description: In attempt to give their children a better life than the Italian circus they were raised in, Amanda’s parents found themselves in a cult. In this episode of Have Hope; Will Travel Amanda shares about that experience, compiled with her experience being sex and labor trafficked, and how writing has always been an escape for ... Read More about  96 Cults, Trafficking, and Writing [Amanda Catarzi]
